title: Where to look during tashahhud? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: when sitting you look at the place of frustration unless you are offering to shout because the authentic hadith said that when the Prophet used to sit and offer to shout he would look at his index finger all the time so when you're sitting you just look at your index finger while wiggling it or shaking it in its place until you finish an offer Salam or you stand up for the following raka this is what the scholars say an Allah knows best [Music]
